title: Building an image processing pipeline with Python
summary: This talk covers the details of how to build a highly scalable image processing pipeline using Python and third-party open source libraries and tools such as OpenCV, NumPy, Tesseract, ImageMagick, Tornado, Nginx and MySQL.
